segments.text: Are you feeling better today , Bill ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it ’ s hard to say . I coughed a lot in the evening .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ d better give up smoking . It ’ s bad for your health .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re right . But you know it ’ s so hard to give up the old habit like smoking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But you should make up your mind first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know I often have to work far into the night . I need smoking to keep me awake .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don ’ t you go to bed early and get up early ? You ’ ll have the same time for work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your advice . I ’ ll try it .
segments.speaker: S2
